message.body: So, Nate says N & M bought the house! Wow!
Not quite yet. I am on my way down there now. Still looking in to the septic system
Will they move out of Brooklyn or keep both?
They will keep both for now
Nice!
Do you think they took and Sophie are serious
Nate and it
I'm talk texting because I'm driving sorry about the typos
Hope so. But I don't dare ask. You can though.....no more driving and texting get back to me when you're not driving.
Seems more serious than anything I've ever seen in the brief moments that I've spoken with him
When we talked about Misa and Michael getting the house he mentioned that maybe when he brought you when Tom down to meet Sophie's parents you could all stay there and use the swimming pool
Oh yeah when's that happening??
He didn't say but I thought that it was an interesting comment
Definitely!!
Hopeful
The sun is actually shining down here hallelujah
Wouldn't it be fun though to have all those kids in one place. Retirement could be a blast. For us anyhow. Ha ha
Retirement?i'll be in my 80s
￼ A little green peeking through in the Delaware water gap
One of my favorite parts to drive through

It's absolutely spectacular. Nisa and I are going to have dinner tonight and then head up to Westchester tomorrow as Leif and Kay will be in town looking at houses. Doubt if we will see much of them but even a coffee will be good
Say hello!
￼Lovely spring day!!
Should have
￼ Should I come to New York with me it's not winter in the Holland tunnel
Not fair!!
pretty! Enjoy your nice spring weekend
Will do. Wish you were here!
Me too!!
What time did U leave here this morning? Looks like U made good time getting down there.
About 5:45
Considering I got stopped TWICE.......I don't wanna talk about it!!!!!
No tickets tho
Glad I wasn't with you but then you probably wouldn't be texting! How do you manage to get out of those?
I told him I was lost and looking at my GPS. IM GOING TO HELL. I really don't type text ever. Just speak
How did my parents not crash with. 8 wild kids in the car???!!0
I was told to ask you about the peeing at the Boston Zoo story
Don't worry we'll be both in Hell together
Yeah that's what I mean
Boston Zoo?
no it was in the middle of Faneuil Hall & Nate pee'd into the grates cause he HAD to go! Oh yeah he was three I believe
Ha!
http://www.syracuse.com/news/index.ssf/2015/04/herd_of_buffalo_on_the_loose_near_albany_after_escaping_ny_farm.html#incart_river_mobile
Poor things! Wonder what's to become of them? Got room at your place??
http://www.syracuse.com/news/index.ssf/2015/04/loose_herd_of_buffalo_that_crossed_ny_highway_near_albany_are_being_shot.html#incart_related_stories
Oh shit. I didn't see this. So sad!!!!! Damn.
stop in Bethlehem and pick up some fresh buffalo meat to bring home.
Oh ugh. That's horrible.
Did you have a picture of you & Nesya at this event last night? Wanna see your do
Hmmm. Don't think so. Will get some today tho!
Thanks,nice to see Neysa!
